The pure class interface. 
public class SeqForm
  extends CompoundForm
The class of sequence forms.

A sequence form represents a sequence of subforms.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: SeqForm.pizza,v 1.4 1998/11/16 00:53:21 wg Exp $
